trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業中所報告的進度資料。

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含屬性，描述進度<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>， <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中的並非每個屬性會套用至每個事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A>代表總位元組數分別下載至日期和下載作業中的位元組總數，而適用於所有三個事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>名稱對應至目前的檔案群組<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>事件，以及<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>反映下載作業的目前階段。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得這項作業已下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesCompleted property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>，BytesCompleted 屬性參考到部署資訊清單的下載。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，屬性參考到整個更新，包含的下載進度的資訊清單、 組件和資料檔案。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，屬性參考到完整的具名群組一部分的檔案的下載進度。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>已經表示資料傳輸，以位元組為單位。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 在下載作業取得位元組的總數。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesTotal property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>，BytesTotal 屬性參考到部署資訊清單的下載。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，屬性參考到整個更新，包含的下載進度的資訊清單、 組件和資料檔案。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，屬性參考到完整的具名群組一部分的檔案的下載進度。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>代表下載，以位元組為單位的大小總計。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在下載的檔案群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 您可以起始多次呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>並同時下載多個檔案群組。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use Group to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪些事件回呼使用群組對應至這些群組。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含的檔案群組名稱，如果事件發生的呼叫結果<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>，否則為零長度字串。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理序目前執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"></xref> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"> </xref>值，指出哪些項目或項目作業目前正在下載。
